name: The Adventure of Flippa Tugga Island
name_original: The Adventure of Flippa Tugga Island
description:
" A professor and his assistant are on the search of a lost pirate treasure after they found a stone plate on the beach of a deserted island. To find the remaining stone plates and to ultimately get the treasure, they must solve different puzzles."

This was a first-semester project for our Animation & Game study course at h_da.

Software: Maya/Blender (Models), Unreal Engine 4 (Game)

Created by Maximilian Köhnlein & Viola Huber
